1.text: Here are the steps to make tea. Read and put them in order.
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Here <break time='200ms'/> are <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> steps <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> make <break time='200ms'/> tea. <break time='200ms'/> Read <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> put <break time='200ms'/> them <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> order. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

2.text: 1. Pour the boiled water into the teapot. □ 2. Add tea leaves and keep it for a few seconds. □ 3. Stir well. □ 4. Now strain it to a jug, and add sugar and milk to taste. □ 5. Now strain it into a cup. □ 6. Boil some water. □
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>1. <break time='200ms'/> Pour <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> boiled <break time='200ms'/> water <break time='200ms'/> into <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> teapot. <break time='200ms'/> 2. <break time='200ms'/> Add <break time='200ms'/> tea <break time='200ms'/> leaves <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> keep <break time='200ms'/> it <break time='200ms'/> for <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> few <break time='200ms'/> seconds. <break time='200ms'/> 3. <break time='200ms'/> Stir <break time='200ms'/> well. <break time='200ms'/> 4. <break time='200ms'/> Now <break time='200ms'/> strain <break time='200ms'/> it <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> jug, <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> add <break time='200ms'/> sugar <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> milk <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> taste. <break time='200ms'/> 5. <break time='200ms'/> Now <break time='200ms'/> strain <break time='200ms'/> it <break time='200ms'/> into <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> cup. <break time='200ms'/> 6. <break time='200ms'/> Boil <break time='200ms'/> some <break time='200ms'/> water. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Read <break time='200ms'/> this <break time='200ms'/> text. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

7.text: I am Poorni. My birthday falls in December. It's on Christmas day. Last year, on my 10th birthday my father and I went to Nicoli bookshop. It was a Wednesday. He bought me two books. They are Madol Duwa and Harry Potter.
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>I <break time='200ms'/> am <break time='200ms'/> Poorni. <break time='200ms'/> My <break time='200ms'/> birthday <break time='200ms'/> falls <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> December. <break time='200ms'/> It's <break time='200ms'/> on <break time='200ms'/> Christmas <break time='200ms'/> day. <break time='200ms'/> Last <break time='200ms'/> year, <break time='200ms'/> on <break time='200ms'/> my <break time='200ms'/> 10th <break time='200ms'/> birthday <break time='200ms'/> my <break time='200ms'/> father <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> went <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> Nicoli <break time='200ms'/> bookshop. <break time='200ms'/> It <break time='200ms'/> was <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> Wednesday. <break time='200ms'/> He <break time='200ms'/> bought <break time='200ms'/> me <break time='200ms'/> two <break time='200ms'/> books. <break time='200ms'/> They <break time='200ms'/> are <break time='200ms'/> Madol <break time='200ms'/> Duwa <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> Harry <break time='200ms'/> Potter. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

8.text: Find the words starting with a capital letter. Write them in your book.
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Find <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> words <break time='200ms'/> starting <break time='200ms'/> with <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> capital <break time='200ms'/> letter. <break time='200ms'/> Write <break time='200ms'/> them <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> your <break time='200ms'/> book. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

9.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>e.g. <break time='200ms'/> :- <break time='200ms'/> He <break time='200ms'/> December <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>
